content: Some of us here will remember Bridget Kirkham, who for many years was CEO of the MSIA. Sadly, Bridget passed away this week. https://aushealthit.blogspot.com/2019/06/vale-bridget-kirkham.html
Very sad news @Grahame Grieve thanks for letting us know. Bridget will be sadly missed, remembering the passion and dynamic personality with fondness.
